traits.Blurred Movement: Attack rolls against the quickling have disadvantage unless the quickling is incapacitated or restrained.
traits.Evasion: If the quickling is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, it instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

actions.Multiattack: The quickling makes three dagger attacks.
actions.Dagger: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +8+1d4 + 6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d4 + 6) piercing damage.
